objects.specification: A large flat rectangular floor base with a smooth matte finish in light grey, featuring a subtle non-slip texture to provide a stable and professional foundation for all booth elements.
A smooth, seamless booth wall panel standing three meters tall, painted in a bright professional white with a matte finish, supported by a concealed frame for a clean, modern appearance.
A smooth, seamless booth wall panel standing three meters tall, painted in a bright professional white with a matte finish, supported by a concealed frame for a clean, modern appearance.

A smooth, seamless booth wall panel standing three meters tall, painted in a bright professional white with a matte finish, supported by a concealed frame for a clean, modern appearance.

A large horizontal rectangular signboard with a slim, elegant frame and glossy surface, designed to display the booth name or corporate logo in high-contrast colors, mounted just above the entrance for clear visibility.

A sleek reception desk with a durable laminate top and integrated modesty panel, featuring a clean, minimalist design in a complementary accent color, sized to comfortably accommodate one or two staff members assisting visitors.
A rectangular display table with a smooth white laminated surface and slim minimalist metal legs, designed for product showcasing at a comfortable height.
A rectangular display table with a smooth white laminated surface and slim minimalist metal legs, designed for product showcasing at a comfortable height.
A rectangular display table with a smooth white laminated surface and slim minimalist metal legs, designed for product showcasing at a comfortable height.
A tall open-frame shelving unit with a sturdy dark-metal frame and multiple flat shelves, ideal for holding brochures and promotional materials in an organized manner.
A tall open-frame shelving unit with a sturdy dark-metal frame and multiple flat shelves, ideal for holding brochures and promotional materials in an organized manner.
A comfortable visitor seat with a plush cushioned seat and backrest upholstered in complementary fabric, featuring slim metal legs for a contemporary look.
A comfortable visitor seat with a plush cushioned seat and backrest upholstered in complementary fabric, featuring slim metal legs for a contemporary look.
A hanging directional spotlight with a cylindrical matte-black housing and adjustable tilt, providing focused illumination over key display areas.
A hanging directional spotlight with a cylindrical matte-black housing and adjustable tilt, providing focused illumination over key display areas.
A decorative hanging fabric banner with vibrant colors and subtle graphic patterns, draped elegantly to create an inviting atmosphere.
A cluster of colorful helium balloons with glossy surfaces, tied together and floating slightly above eye level for a playful decorative accent.
A lush potted plant with vibrant green foliage arranged in a modern decorative planter, adding a fresh natural touch to the booth corner.
